data.name: Haram
data.description: Actions that are strictly forbidden in Islam and are punishable by Allah. These actions are considered sinful and a Muslim should refrain from committing them.

data.name: Makruh
data.description: Actions that are discouraged in Islam but not strictly forbidden. Muslims are advised to avoid these actions as they are considered disliked by Allah.

data.name: Mubah
data.description: Actions that are permissible in Islam and are neither encouraged nor discouraged. Muslims are free to choose whether to engage in these actions or not.

data.name: Mandub
data.description: Actions that are encouraged in Islam but not strictly required. Muslims are rewarded for performing these actions.

data.name: Wajib
data.description: Actions that are mandatory in Islam and Muslims are required to perform them. Neglecting these actions is considered sinful and Muslims may be punished for failing to perform them.
